level.heading: Books of annual record; delivery for publication.
level.text: ยง 11-219 Books of annual record; delivery for publication. Within two weeks after the delivery of the assessment-rolls to the council, the commissioner of finance shall furnish to the director of the City Record a copy of the several books of the annual record of the assessed valuation of real estate, omitting, however, the two columns headed respectively "size of house" and "houses on lot."
